Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Authorizes an occupancy tax in the city of Auburn
Summary: Authorizes an occupancy tax in the city of Auburn not to exceed 5%; provides for the expiration and repeal of such provisions on December 31, 2027.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to authorizing an occupancy tax in the city of Auburn; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
